function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of education, information, and awareness integration into educational curricula may hinder adoption of CE principles and lifecycle systems thinking","Impact":"Limited understanding and awareness of CE and lifecycle systems thinking, leading to slower adoption of sustainable practices","Mitigation":"Integrate CE and lifecycle systems thinking into educational curricula, and conduct public communication and information campaigns","Technologies":"Education platforms, public communication tools","People":"General public, students, educators","Owner":"Educational institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate platforms for collaboration and public-private partnerships may impede the sharing of information and hinder breakthroughs in materials science and engineering","Impact":"Limited collaboration and information sharing, leading to slower progress in materials science and engineering for CE","Mitigation":"Establish platforms for collaboration, public-private partnerships, and research and development initiatives","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, information sharing tools","People":"Public and private sector organizations, researchers, scientists","Owner":"Government agencies, industry associations"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainability initiatives in public procurement and infrastructure may lead to continued reliance on non-sustainable practices","Impact":"Continued use of non-sustainable procurement and infrastructure, hindering the transition to a CE","Mitigation":"Introduce sustainability initiatives in public procurement and infrastructure","Technologies":"Sustainable procurement tools, infrastructure planning tools","People":"Government agencies, procurement professionals, infrastructure planners","Owner":"Government agencies"}]}
